arts.ttl: Julián Álvarez picking up the scoring pace with Atletico Madrid
arts.sum: “We know that in this format of the competition we need to keep adding the three points and scoring goals,” Álvarez said. The Argentina forward curled in the free kick shot in the 15th minute for the first of his two goals in the team’s 6-0 rout of Brest in the Champions League on Tuesday — the team’s biggest ever away win in European competitions.

arts.ttl: “He has to stay” – Rodrigo De Paul makes clear his thoughts on Diego Simeone’s Atletico Madrid future
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid had a difficult month-long spell during October, but since then, things have turned around. Tuesday’s 6-0 victory over Sparta Praha in the Champions League means that it is now six wins in a row across all competition for Los Colchoneros. Amidst this excellent run, there has been speculation on Diego Simeone’s future as […] The post “He has to stay” – Rodrigo De Paul makes clear his thoughts on Diego Simeone’s Atletico Madrid future appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: AC Milan and Atletico Madrid each win to near automatic qualifying spots in Champions League
arts.sum: AC Milan followed up its win at Real Madrid with a 3-2 victory at last-place Slovan Bratislava in the Champions League on Tuesday. Atletico beat Paris Saint-Germain in the previous round and extended its winning streak across all competitions to six matches.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid President backs Diego Simeone amid rumours over future
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid President Enrique Cerezo has publicly declared that manager Diego Simeone is not going anywhere, despite recent speculation that they have begun the hunt for his replacement. Simeone has been at the club nearly 13 years, bringing about their most successful period in their history, and establishing Los Colchoneros as the third force in […] The post Atletico Madrid President backs Diego Simeone amid rumours over future appeared first on Football España.
